text.jpText:
トリプルティアラの終着点、『秋華賞』。
メジロドーベルは控室まで響いてくる
歓声にも全く動じず、集中を保っていた。
text.enText:
Triple Tiara's End of the Line, "Shukka Sho". 
Mejiro Dobel echoed all the way to the 
waiting room. She was completely unfazed by 
the cheers and kept her concentration.

text.jpText:
レースに向かう直前、メジロドーベルは
トリプルティアラの集大成を皆に見せると
力強く宣言するのだった……！
text.enText:
Just before heading into the race, Mejiro 
Dobel announced emphatically that she would 
show everyone the culmination of her Triple 
Tiara. She declared emphatically that she 
would show everyone the culmination of Triple 
Tiara's success. ……!
